name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ ContactRelationship Code System

description.value:
More granular ContactRelationship codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.
This codeset is to be used alongside the HL7 defined general relationship codeset in http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-patient-contactrelationship.html

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ ContactRelationship Value Set

description.value:
NZ ContactRelationship Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region
This codeset is to be used alongside the HL7 defined general relationship codeset http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0131

description.value: Value set being the raw 3-letter (and sometimes 4-letter) raw codes in use in Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region Alert

description.value: Complex extension recording meta data about all alerts, on who recorded the [Flag](./StructureDefinition-NZCentralRegionFlag.html) and [AllergyIntolerance](./StructureDefinition-NZCentralRegionAllergyIntolerance.html) flavours of Alert and when.

name.value: NZ Central Region Allergy Reaction to Category Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping allergy reaction codes ex. WebPAS to FHIR allergy category codes. Added complexity as we have codes from two different code-systems

name.value: NZ Central Region Allergy Reaction to Criticality Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping allergy reaction codes ex. WebPAS to FHIR allergy criticality codes. Added complexity as we have codes from two different code-systems

name.value: NZ Central Region Allergy Reaction to Type Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping allergy reaction codes ex. WebPAS to FHIR allergy type codes. Added complexity as we have codes from two different code-systems

name.value: NZ Central Region Ethnicity Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping level 2 ethnicity codes ex. WebPAS to proper level 4 ethnicity codes

name.value: NZ Central Region Language Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping raw Language codes ex. WebPAS to proper `ietf:bcp:47` language codes

name.value: NZ Central Region Mental Health

description.value: Complex extension recording meta data about patient's mental health, particularly legal status

name.value: NZ Central Region NZ Residency Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping raw detailed NZ Residency codes ex. WebPAS to yes | no | unknown codes from NZ Base

name.value: NZ Central Region Referral

description.value: Complex extension recording extra data about referrals

name.value: NZ Central Region Referral Priority Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping referral priority codes ex. WebPAS to FHIR ServiceRequest priority codes

name.value: NZ Central Region Religion Concept Map

description.value: Concept map mapping raw religion codes ex. WebPAS to proper FHIR religion codes
